projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: My portfolio webpage, heck yeeah. This webpage highlights all my skills, and projects. Go check them out, they are awesome!

projects.name: Reaktor junior dev assingment
projects.description: A (made up) customer needed a simple web app to use in their warehouses. I came up with this desing, that fetches data from API and lists it explicitly.

projects.name: Turku-polkupyörät
projects.description: A simple website that shows Turku town-bicycle positions in stations realtime. One of the first projects I made myself.
projects.learned: React, API-fetch & displaying information from it.

projects.name: Recipebook
projects.description: I made myself a recipebook! Not anything special here, but it works. The plan is that only authorized people can edit the recipes, and others could read them. WIP-project.
projects.learned: Database integration, backend-development & how to build node.js applications.

projects.name: Chat-app
projects.description: Simple website that uses react-hooks and firebase-library to update the content in realtime. Kinda cool project in my opinion. No source code in github because I am scared that I leak my api-keys :D

projects.name: Athene Job-bot
projects.description: A simple webscraper, that sends telegram messages to our guild's job-hunt group, if a new job positions are found. I very much enjoyed this project!

projects.name: Tori.fi bot
projects.description: Again, a simple webscraper that searches for products in Tori.fi. I got the idea for it, because my mom searched for a new piano -> 'That's a time waste, lets automate!' -Me
